entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Snow level 700 metres lowering to valley bottom this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
